sentences.en: " Well, try to recollect -- can't you? "
sentences.cn: “ 那么, 尽量回想一下 行 不行? ”

sentences.en: All I recollect is a grey sky.
sentences.cn: 我只记得一片灰色的天空。

sentences.en: As far as I can recollect, her name was Juliet.
sentences.cn: 就我所能记忆, 她叫朱丽叶.

sentences.en: Cannot you recollect at all what she said?
sentences.cn: 你根本回忆不起来她说了什么 吗 ?

sentences.en: He seemed to recollect himself presently, and smothered the storm.
sentences.cn: 他仿佛马上又镇定了,压下了这场风波.

sentences.en: He tried hard to recollect the old scenes of his hometown.
sentences.cn: 他翻来覆去地用心回忆他家乡旧时的情景.

sentences.en: He tried to recollect things and drown himself in them.
sentences.cn: 他极力回想过去的事情而沉浸于回忆之中.

sentences.en: I can't recollect the exact words.
I can't seem to recollect where we met.
sentences.cn: 我似乎想不起我们在哪儿见过面.

sentences.en: I cannot recollect whether I told you or not about Allen Bennett.
sentences.cn: 我想不起来是否曾告诉过你关于艾伦·贝内特的事了.

sentences.en: I recollect the days passed by the seaside.
sentences.cn: 我回想起了当初在海边度过的日子。

sentences.en: I tried hard to recollect what I saw just before the accident.
sentences.cn: 我苦苦追忆着出事前见到的一切.

sentences.en: I'm all in a muddle ; can't recollect anything of it, hardly.
sentences.cn: 我现在 昏昏沉沉, 几乎回忆不起来任何事情.

sentences.en: She could no longer recollect the details of the letter.
sentences.cn: 她想不起那封信的细节了。

sentences.en: She could not recollect being there.
sentences.cn: 她回想不起曾经到过那儿.

sentences.en: Try hard to recollect what you saw before the accident.
sentences.cn: 好好回想一下事故发生之前你看到的事情.

trans.tran_cn: 想起，回想，追忆，回忆，记忆，使（自己）想起一时忘掉的事，想到
trans.tran_en: to be able to remember something
